Tout simplement mon jeu préféré, drôle et intelligent à la fois. On peut le faire et le refaire sans jamais s'ennuyer. De plus, les maps des autres joueurs permettent de renouveler l'expérience constamment. Bref, un jeu à absolument avoir dans sa bibliothèque.

É incrivel como The Portal 2 ainda me deixa inpressionado de pois de fechar umas dezenas de vezes. O melhor game com humor, tensão, surpresas, estória, jogabilidade e um gráfico excelente. Sem palavras, um dos melhores games de todos os tempos.

One of the best games of all time.

Words cannot describe how great this game is.  It's challenging, creative, and it seems like it would have taken hundreds of thousands of man hours for the developers to code it so well.

I'm especially impressed by the gentle error correction for portals and lasers, and how fault-tolerant they manage to be without breaking the in-game laws of physics.

Отличная игра

One of those games that you will always want to come back to. Portal 2 is that one game that will let you enjoy making Portals for you to run through, let you see the backstory of Aperture throughout the years, and reunite with someone familiar that still has that burning hatred. If Valve was ever to make a 3rd Sequel to any of their games, this would have to be one (as well as Half Life *cough* *cough*) as there will be those fun puzzle games with robots, gravity beams, and the lovable Companion Cube that can be done by yourself or with another person in Co-op mode! This is one of my favourite 10/10 games that will be a game I would recommend to anyone to tryout.

传送门2是最好的逻辑思维与观察力的训练，优秀的关卡设计使玩家只能依靠对步骤的严谨规划而不是瞎蒙瞎猜来解决问题。。。
Потрясающая игра. Создателям удалось совместить головоломки и интересный сюжет. Ооочень качественный продукт.
无论是单人模式还是和好友一起开黑，传送门2都会给人一种不一样的体验，看起来一点都不简单的关卡总是会放大玩家通关时的喜悦心情。

One of the finest puzzle classics that I have ever played.
It's fun, interesting and exciting. It is instantly playable, but it is deep nonetheless.
This is a must-have for every game-lover.

M8 this is just perfect. Best game to test your skills and ability of solving puzzles. Also its campaign its also good but very long (so good luck finishing it). Some times in the campaign (well almost everytime) they like to troll you. Making you think you already finished the campaign (but its not true). Also well known when you are trying to complete a level and you stay hours trying to look for the exit or solution and then you realize that it was just in front of you. Thats why this awesome game needs to win the award. THX GABEN :3 (SO KNOW CAN YOU GIVE ME HALF LIFE 3?) xDDDD just kidding.
One of the best games ever. Period!

A perfect blend puzzles and humor Portal 2 is a game that will create fond memories for anyone lucky enough to have played this game.  The puzzle solutions are not impossibly hard but challenging enough to give you a feeling of accomplishment when you've figured a level out. The dialogue is entertaining and does a great job of threading the levels together.  This game is a must have for any gamer's collection.
